峘字的基本解释

峘
huán
高于大山的小山。

峘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》胡官切，平桓，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡登切，平登，匣。］
(1)高过大山的小山。
(2)大山。
[②]［héng］
［《廣韻》胡登切，平登，匣。］
同“恒1”。
见“峘2嶽”。

峘字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峘； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页310第37
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡官切，音桓。【爾雅·釋山】小山岌大山，峘。【疏】邢昺曰：小山與大山相?，而小山高過於大山者爲峘。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?胡登切，音恆。義同。　【集韻】或作??。

峘字的起名意思

高于大山的小山。

峘
huán
A hill higher than the mountain.

[①] [huán]
["Guangyun" Hu Guanqie, Pinghuan, Xie. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Dengqie, Ping Deng, Xia. ]
(1) A hill higher than the mountain.
(2) Dashan.
[②]［héng］

Same as "Heng 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峘; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 310 Page 37
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Guan cut, Yin Huan. 【Erya·Shishan】The small hills are big mountains, 峘. [Shu] Xing Bing said: The hills and the mountains are similar, and the hills are higher than the mountains.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu Dengqie, Yinheng. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】or as ??.
